subject: Golf
Deaths (Obituaries)
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Barber was a popular and successful player on the P.G.A. Tour in the 1960s and went on to dominate in the early years of senior tournament play.
snippet: Barber was a popular and successful player on the P.G.A. Tour in the 1960s and went on to dominate in the early years of senior tournament play.
